doc: I'll give Disney some credit. They are brave enough to leave the comment section open They finally did it. They made a movie nobody is going to pirate. Disney - “Coming to a theatre near you” Me - Is that a threat? At this point the comment section is the real Magic Mirror. Rachel Zelger: Snow White is not gonna be saved by the Prince. The Prince: Good. Because I'm here for your stepmother. At this point, the monetization of this video is gonna earn Disney more revenue than the movie itself will. 1. Stop the video at 0.00 2. Enjoy the comments section "Coming to a theater near you" For the first time in my life I'm glad there are no theaters near me. "Mirror mirror on the wall, who is the bravest of them all?" "Disney, for not locking the comment section" This trailer makes me want to sit on the TV and look at my couch “Coming to a theater near you!” *Files a restraining order* $200m+ budget on the worlds most hilarious comments section. Worth it. Evil queen: Did I frighten you? The general public: No, Snow White and her seven CGI did. Nobody has ever rooted for a poison apple until this movie! GO APPLE GO!!! Disney: Relive the classic story! Also Disney: *Changes the classic story* Disney had actually taught me a very valuable lesson in life: Never believe it can’t get worse. Rachel Zegler: I don't need your business. Everyone: Your terms are acceptable. This movie is magical. When I closed the tab, my life was magically made better. Came here just to read the comments. Was not disappointed. Yall cooking in these comments, this is the most expensive roast session in history. Making the dwarfs look like a ps1 Hagrid was a bold choice "The snow white trailer just dropped" "Tell disney to pick it back up" My phone didn’t just die watching this, it took its own life. Rachel Zegler: Snow white doesn’t need a prince to save her! Andrew: Oh, thank God. Can I go now? why is the queen prettier than snow white? i thought the whole point was that the queen was supposed to be jealous of snow white? Evil queen: "I don't remember you being this opinionated." Me: "Oh look, Evil queen is breaking the fourth wall." This trailer makes me finally understand why the first thing a rooster does after getting up every morning is screaming. Queen: Mirror, mirror, who is the most beautiful woman in the world? Mirror: Lord Farquaad Snow White: Hello, anybody here? Projector Operator: Just me. Evil queen: Mirror mirror on the.... Magic mirror: Don't bother, you win. Roll credits. If this movie had been released in the 1900s, Titanic would have been forgotten as the worst disaster For those not using the extension, currently: Likes 38K Dislikes 948K Just 52K left to one million! Mirror, mirror on the wall, I came here for the comments and am not disappointed at all. That ratio is brutal... and exactly what Disney deserves after blaming the paying customer for their own bad writing over the past decade. At this point Disney should be paying *us* to watch the movie. this cured my procrastination. i actually closed the tab five seconds in and wrote three college papers. pirating will be the only way it gets watched cause nobody will pay to see it XD Disney: leave the comments on , the worst they'll say is no Comments: music time! "Coming to a theater near you" This movie is the sun of my life, it needs to get 93 million miles away from me. Disney: “Coming soon to a theatre near you” Me: “Hello, I’d like to file a police report” I’d have given them more credit if they’d cast a Palestinian actress to play Snow White. @@mirandasworld the filmmakers got everything else wrong, so why not that as well? Me too This movie should be titled "Snow White and the Comments Section" For those who aren't using the Return Youtube dislikes extention Likes: 82K Dislikes: 2.4M Nailed it. For now anyway Damnit, I've watched a whole second of it before it finally stopped P.S 3. Hit the dislike button Disney: *Leaves Comment's Open* Everyone In The Comment Section: *Becomes The
summary: I'll give Disney some credit. They are brave enough to leave the comment section open They finally did it. They made a movie nobody is going to pirate. Disney - “Coming to a theatre near you” Me - Is that a threat? At this point the comment section is the real Magic Mirror. Rachel Zelger: Snow White is not gonna be saved by the Prince. The Prince: Good. Because I'm here for your stepmother. At this point, the monetization of this video is gonna earn Disney more revenue than the movie itself will.
